A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don’t know why everyone is not liking this movie. Sorry it wasn’t a plot by plot “safe” movie. Give it time. Everyone will turn. Let’s break it down. Compared to “The Force Awakens” it had better comedic elements\, better creatures\, better twists\, more emotional elements\, a better score\, better locations\, better fight scenes\, better acting\, Benicio Del Toro\, Laura Dern\, better pacing\, better editing\, and Yoda as a puppet and not CGI. Also\, I didn’t want this one to end whereas last time it felt like time was up for the story. I think this one will stand on its own no matter how J.J. Abrams ends it.
